content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Iron Plate Smelter at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of a furnace used to smelt iron ore and coal into iron plates. This structure is employed to increase the iron plate inventory needed for subsequent Lab crafting attempts.

### Copper Plate Smelter at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a furnace used to process copper ore and coal into copper plates. Its role is to augment the copper plate resources required for crafting copper‐cable and other intermediate items for Lab production.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• get_entities API misuse – Avoid providing unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or an incorrect number of positional arguments. Verify the API signature before invoking the function.
• NoneType iteration errors – Ensure that the return value from get_entities is validated (e.g. replacing None with an empty list) before attempting to iterate over it.
• Lab placement issues – Confirm that a Lab exists in inventory prior to attempting placement at a target location.
• Lab crafting failures – Check that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels and electronic circuits) are available and that prerequisite production processes (such as sufficient smelting operations for iron and copper plates) have been completed before initiating Lab crafting.
